name: Attack
description: A standard attack.

name: Reinforce
description: Beorn increases armor for next two times being hit.

name: Riposte
description: Beorn will partially evade the next attack, and counterattack.

name: Phalanx
description: Beorn will take a portion of the damage dealt to his teammates behind him.

name: Purity
description: Cedric's health increases, and is healed for an equal amount.

name: Righteousness
description: The next two enemy attacks will be redirected to Cedric.

name: Corruption
description: Cedric's attack is increased, but his total health is reduced.

name: Blood Thrust
description: Grim consumes a portion of his HP to deal additional damage to a single target.

name: Blood Bond
description: Grim does a strong attack.  If target is afflicted with Necrosis, Grim will also heal himself.

name: Blood Cleave
description: Grim consumes a portion of his HP to deal additional damage to the front two targets.

name: Cleave
description: Lambug deals damage to the front two enemy targets.

name: Overexertion
description: Lambug deals a large single attack that decreases in damage every subsequent use.

name: Amped Up
description: Lambug deals additional single target damage at full health.

name: Meteor
description: Zoe attacks all enemies and applies the scorched debuff. Scorched enemies take damage every turn.

name: Conflagrate
description: Zoe attacks a single enemy.  The enemy will become scorched.

name: Apocalypse
description: Zoe focuses her energy for two turns, and on the third, deals massive single target damage.

name: Frost Strike
description: Neve attacks a single target and applies a chilled effect. If the target is already chilled,  Zoe deals increased damage.

name: Snowstorm
description: Neve attacks all enemies and applies a chilled effect.

name: Deep Freeze
description: Neve becomes immune to all damage until her next turn.

name: Decay
description: Titus deals damage an ally in front to apply Necrosis to an enemy, which deals damages over time.

name: Decompose
description: Titus deals damage to allies behind himself to apply Necrosis to enemies.  Grim is immune.

name: Disintegrate
description: Applies Necrosis to every unit.  Titus and Grim are immune.

name: Restore
description: Troy heals the teammate missing the most health.

name: Rejuvenate
description: Troy heals all allies equally.

name: Reinvigorate
description: Troy empowers an ally.  The ally will heal on their turn.

name: Paeon
description: Inspires all teammates, increasing their HP

name: Madrigal
description: Inspires all teammates, increasing their Pow

name: Requiem
description: Targets all enemies, increasing damage taken next time they're hit

name: Snipe
description: Grogmar attacks the enemy with lowest HP. If the enemy is less than 50%, Grogmar deals additional damage

name: Flare
description: Grogmar attacks the third enemy unit.  If the enemy is scorched, Grogmar will consume scorch and deal additional damage.

name: Incapacitate
description: Grogmar attacks the fourth enemy unit.  If the enemy is at full health, Grogmar deals additional damage.

name: Double Tap
description: Revere attacks twice in the same round.

name: Cold Cuts
description: Revere attacks the second enemy unit.  If the enemy is chilled, Revere does additional damage

name: Lucky Stab
description: Revere attacks a single enemy.  Revere will do much more damage if her HP ends in a 7.

name: Direct Hit
description: Caeda marks the second unit in enemy list to focus adventurer team attacks.

name: Dead Center
description: Caeda marks the third unit in enemy list to focus adventurer team attacks.

name: Bulls Eye
description: Caeda marks the fourth unit in enemy list to focus adventurer team attacks.

name: Swift Strike
description: Attacks the enemy and heals for the same amount.

name: Regenerate
description: Heals self instead of attacking

name: Wilt
description: Reduce healing of target attacked

name: Full Force
description: Massive damage if at full health

name: Sure Shot
description: Attacks an enemy.  If that enemy is buffed, Elf Scout deals additional damage.

name: Healing Spores
description: Heals self instead of attacking.  Additional healing done below half health.

name: Gloop Glop
description: Removes debuffs from all allies and heals if debuffed

name: Antisymbiosis
description: If less than full health deals additional damage

name: Holy Radiation
description: Heals adjacent units

name: Deadly Web
description: Damages last hero, if full health deal additional damage

name: Translucent
description: Negates damage taken next time being hit.

name: Purge
description: Removes all debuffs from allies and damages for each debuff removed

name: Overpower
description: Deals additional damage if enemy is below 50% HP

name: Helping Hand
description: Heals teammate for a moderate amount

name: Lightning Storm
description: Damages all enemy units

name: Phase Out
description: Negates damage until next turn

name: Life Seed
description: Heal all teammates, heal additional if undamaged

name: Avalanche
description: All undamaged units lose 50% of their HP

name: Evasion
description: All allies evade incoming damage the next time they are attacked

name: Ignition
description: Damage all enemy units. Units take more damage if this unit is full HP

name: Lasers
description: Deal a powerful magical attack to the enemy.

name: Crab Hammer
description: Attacks for 25% of max HP of defender

name: Viking Smash
description: Deals damage to last enemy

name: Stronger Together
description: Heals for each living ally

name: Jarls Blessing
description: Increases damage of each adjacent ally

name: Shellstopper
description: Gains 25% damage reduction for 4 attacks

name: Fragment Bone
description: Explodes, killing itself and dealing massive damage

name: Execute
description: Deals massive damage to lowest HP enemy

name: Dwarvish Prayer
description: Heals unit in front of this enemy

name: Ten Tickles
description: Damages all enemies, deals additional damage if damaged

name: Bonesplosion
description: Deals massive damage to each enemy

name: Bone Up
description: Regenerates to full health

name: Sleepytime
description: Maybe he's doing yoga?

name: Tree Nothing
description: Trees don't move

name: Tree Nothing Passive
description: Trees are strong

name: Tree Wallop
description: High damage attack to second in order

name: Prickly Personality
description: Attacking this enemy damages the hero

name: Needle Barrage
description: Hurls a thousand needles at the two nearest targets

name: Forgotten Wish
description: Redistributes enemy health to be equal

name: Decay
description: Deals 2% max HP damage to each enemy

name: Bone Down
description: When dead, turn into a pile of bones instead

name: Blank Canvas
description: Attack a Hero and absorb their Type

name: Masterpiece
description: Attack and perform an action based off form - Mighty: Gain stacking protective shield. Mindful: Heal and gain a % heal buff. Moxious: Add debuff to take additional damage

name: Rising Phoenix
description: Once below 25%, Phoenix will turn into an egg and attempt to regenerate health

name: Phoenix Fire
description: Burns the first enemy, dealing damage for every stack

name: Hibernate
description: Monster is sleeping and performs no action

name: Rise
description: Monster returns to its original form

name: MKF 1
description: AoE attack

name: MKF 2
description: Healing attack

name: MKF 3
description: I hide in trees
